title: Upcoming changes to MUI X pricing in 2024
text: Check out the new pricing updates and how to transition to the new model.

title: Material UI v6 is out now
text: This major release includes CSS variables support, experimental opt-in CSS extraction, and many more improvements. Check out the announcement blog post.

title: MUI X v8 alpha
text: Check our plans for the upcoming stable in the announcement blog post.

title: Material UI v7 is here
text: This major release improves the integration with modern tools and consistency across the library. Check out the announcement blog post.

title: Introducing MUI X v8
text: Powerful new features and highly requested new components. Read the full details in the MUI X v8 announcement blog post.
